from.info: Traded Erik Cole, 2015 conditional third round pick (if Red Wings do not advance to 2015 Eastern Conference Finals and Cole does not play in 50% of Red Wings playoff games) to Red Wings for Mattias Backman, Mattias Janmark, 2015 second round pick on 2015-03-01

to.info: Traded Jason Spezza to Stars for Alex Chiasson, Nicholas Paul, Alexander Guptill, Ludwig Karlsson, 2015 second round pick on 2014-07-01

Traded Mattias Backman, Mattias Janmark-Nylen, 2015 second round pick to Stars for Erik Cole, 2015 conditional third round pick (if Red Wings do not advance to 2015 Eastern Conference Finals and Cole does not play in 50% of Red Wings playoff games) on 2015-03-01

from.info: Traded Brenden Dillon to Sharks for Jason Demers, 2016 third round pick on 2014-11-21

to.info: Traded Jhonas Enroth to Stars for Anders Lindback, 2016 conditional round pick (second round if Enroth wins 4 playoff games in 2015, else third round) on 2015-02-11 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)
Traded Shawn Horcoff to Stars for Philip Larsen, 2016 seventh round pick on 2013-07-04
